#summary Page describes possible formats of baxtep rules files
#labels Phase-Design

= Format #1  =

*allow|deny* _regular_expression_ `[`_options_`]`

I.e:
{{{
allow ^myapp /[\w/]+$ [L]
deny ^nohup []
deny &$ [FL]
}}}

Possible options:
 * i - case insensitive match
 * L - log this match
 * l - never log this match
 * F - throw fatal error (valid only for *deny* action)
 * f - never throw fatal error

There is 2 options in php.ini to change rules' behaviour:
 * baxtep.force_log - always log matched rule (except with *l* option)
 * baxtep.fatal_on_deny - always throw fatal error on *deny* action (except with *f* option)
